description: A source of properties for a property list. Supports three selection patterns: publisher with tags, publisher with property IDs, or direct identifiers.

oneOf.description: Select properties from a publisher by tag membership

publisher_domain.description: Domain where publisher's adagents.json is hosted (e.g., 'raptive.com')

selection_type.description: Discriminator indicating selection by property tags within a publisher

tags.description: Property tags from the publisher's adagents.json. Selects all properties with these tags.

oneOf.title: Publisher Tags Source

oneOf.description: Select specific properties from a publisher by ID

property_ids.description: Specific property IDs from the publisher's adagents.json

publisher_domain.description: Domain where publisher's adagents.json is hosted (e.g., 'raptive.com')

selection_type.description: Discriminator indicating selection by specific property IDs within a publisher

oneOf.title: Publisher Property IDs Source

oneOf.description: Select properties by direct identifiers (domains, app IDs, etc.) without publisher context

identifiers.description: Direct property identifiers (domains, app IDs, etc.)

selection_type.description: Discriminator indicating selection by direct identifiers

oneOf.title: Direct Identifiers Source

title: Base Property Source
